attributes.action: Stop public funding of the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
Government to debate the role of the BBC in view of its appalling recent record,
The BBC royal charter to be rescinded and the BBC pays its own way without taxpayers subsidies
attributes.background: The BBC exists because the annual licence fee is forced on the UK population , it should be made to go commercial and fund itself

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586818
